Question 1
Many common devices use this form of energy. All the devices that use a plug and socket like this are using what kind of energy?
A. Heat
B. Light
C. Sound
D. Electrical
Question 2
People might use a lamp to help them see, but in many cases, the bulb gets quite warm. The two forms of energy being produced by the lamp are -
A. light and thermal energy
B. light and mechanical energy
C. thermal and mechanical energy
D. mechanical and electrical energy
Question 3
Which of the following devices requires electrical energy to produce light, and sound energy?
A. Bicycle
B. Television
C. Air conditioner
D. Drum

Question 5

A. Toaster
B. Television
C. Ceiling fan
D. Washing machine
